title: Back 2 School Makeover
description: Back 2 School Makeover is a fashionable game journey with Amelia. Watch as she transforms from an edgy e-girl into a stylish, school-ready fashionista. Start with a haircare routine and fresh haircut, then choose skincare and makeup. Explore her chic wardrobe for the perfect outfit, and relive the nostalgia of school days with flair!
